message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the deal, but I'm hoping to get it a bit closer to my budget. I'd be willing to pay $130 for it.  What do you think?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $135. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll love the deal!
